This is a list of current available docs:

Time series memo

docs.title: Time series memo
docs.text: This document describes statistical methods that can used for time series analysis, with associated formulas and practical usage with Excel.

docs.title: Notations
docs.text:
Here is a list of the notations used thoughout this document

  • \(Y_t\): the data value at time \(t\)
  • \(S_t\): the seasonal coeficient at time \(t\)
  • ...

docs.title: Moving average
docs.text:
Simple and efficient way to smooth the data, equivalent to the convolution of the signal by a window.
